IncrementalSaleDataUpdated().details: emitted when incremental sale data updated

IncrementalSaleUpdated().details: emitted when incremental sale created or removed or incremetal sale end tree id updated

createIncrementalSale(uint256,uint256,ui.details: admin set a tree range from {startTreeId} to {startTreeId + treeCount} for incremental sales NOTE emit an {IncrementalSaleUpdated} event

params._increments: number of trees after which the price increases
params._treeCount: number of tree in incremental sell

fundTree(uint256,address,address,uint256.details: fund {_count} tree NOTE if {_recipient} address exist tree minted to the {_recipient} and mint to the function caller otherwise NOTE function caller pay for the price of trees NOTE total price calculated based on the incrementalSaleData NOTE based on the allocation data for tree totalBalances and PlanterFund contract balance updated NOTE generate unique symbols for trees NOTE emit an {TreeFunded} event

initialize(address).details: initialize AccessRestriction contract and set true for isIncrementalSale

params._accessRestrictionAddress: set to the address of AccessRestriction contract

returns._0: true if IncrementalSale contract have been initialized
last tree id sold in incremetal sale

removeIncrementalSale(uint256).details: remove some trees from incremental sale and reset saleType of that trees NOTE {_count} trees removed from first of the incremetalSale tree range NOTE emit an {IncrementalSaleUpdated} event

params._count: is number of trees to remove

updateEndTreeId(uint256).details: admin update endTreeId of incrementalSale tree range NOTE  emit an {IncrementalSaleUpdated} event

params._treeCount: number of trees added at the end of the incrementalSale tree range

updateIncrementalSaleData(uint256,uint64.details: admin update incrementalSaleData NOTE emit a {IncrementalSaleDataUpdated} event

params._increments: number of trees after which the price increases
